Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the photo shows Rajasthan Chief Minister Ashok Gehlot defying the ban on firecrackers in November 2020, when in fact the photo was shared on Gehlot's verified Instagram account in October 2019, before the ban was implemented.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a false interpretation of the photo and does not provide any evidence to back up the assertion that Gehlot was defying the ban.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo was taken during the time when the ban on firecrackers was in effect, without any evidence to support this assumption.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo was shared on Gehlot's Instagram account in October 2019, before the ban on firecrackers was implemented.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the photo was taken during a previous Diwali celebration and has no relevance to the ban on firecrackers in November 2020.
